p: The aerial parts of Niphogeton dissecta in flowering state were collected in September and October 2016 in the sector Loma la Torre, Loja, at an altitude of 3210 m a.s.l., with coordinates 696030 N, 9593252 E. The specimen was identified by Dr. Fani Tinitana of the UTPL herbarium, and deposited with voucher number 5835. The plant was collected under permission of the Ministry of Environment of Ecuador (MAE-DNB-CM-2016-0048).
